code: import{combineReducers,configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import wareReducer from"./reducers/wareReducer";import authorizationReducer from"./reducers/authorizationReducer";var rootReducer=combineReducers({wareReducer:wareReducer,authorizationReducer:authorizationReducer});export var setupStore=function setupStore(){return configureStore({reducer:rootReducer});};
